name.title: NFT Name
name.description: Full display name for this NFT, typically including token identifier, waste type, and weight

short_name.title: Short Name
short_name.description: Compact name for UI summaries, tables, or tooltips, typically including token identifier

description.title: Description
description.description: Human-readable summary describing the waste batch, origin, processing method, and chain of custody. Ideally, maximum 300 characters.
examples: This MassID represents 3 metric tons of organic food waste from Enlatados Produção, tracked through complete chain of custody from generation to composting.
This RecycledID represents 2.5 metric tons of recycled plastic bottles processed by Green Solutions Ltd.

attributes.title: Credit Retirement Receipt NFT Attribute Array
attributes.description:
Attributes for credit retirement receipts including per-credit breakdowns, totals, beneficiary, credit holder, retirement date, certificate count, and optional purchase info. Fixed required attributes: Total Credits Retired, Beneficiary, Retirement Date, Certificates Retired. Conditional attributes: Credit Holder (required when credit_holder.identity.name is provided), Purchase Date (optional, when purchase_receipt is present), Purchase Receipt (optional, when purchase_receipt is present). Dynamic attributes: Credit attributes (one per credit symbol in data.credits).

Required attributes (4): Total Credits Retired, Beneficiary, Retirement Date, Certificates Retired

anyOf.title: Total Credits Retired Attribute
anyOf.description: Total number of credits retired across all tokens attribute with numeric display

value.title: Total Credits Retired
value.description: Total number of credits retired across all tokens

max_value.description: Maximum possible value for numeric traits
